review: Stick arrived yesterday.  Reception is great and set up and using are,so far, easy.  The only complaintis the length of the power cord is about 18-24 inches and not long enough to reach my outlet.
author: Linda Tuttle

review: I never this much from this device! Very very nice! This is a winner!
author: David Schmidt

review: We LOVE the fire tv stick! It works great, has all the apps we need and want. Initial install was a little slow, but well worth the wait!
author: aevans2915

review: The set up was quick and simple (maybe 5 minutes).  The speed is impressive.  I mean the spinning wheel that I am used to with my Xbox has been replaced with quick and snappy content loading.
author: Heavy "Heavy"

review: Great device. One star off due to some wifi connectivity issues/dropped connections.
author: V P

review: In my opinion this device provides the best value of all the other media players available.
author: Boltsfan91

review: We have been considering getting rid of cable and this may very well be what replaces it! Setup was easy and works great so far. Would definitely recommend this.
author: Jody "JodyT"

review: Easy to install.  What a great deal this was
author: Felando
